reviews.text: Close to train station, rooms ample Size and clean and modern. Staff are really friendly as are all Danish. Need to order room service online when you want it. Kids play area in the restaurant. We had a family room for 4 plus a free cot to fit all 5 of us in. Breakfast was good but no bacon or standard beans, though plenty to choose from. We stayed 9 nights to make the most of trips out.
Stayed for 32 nights and the room was amazing! The spread for breakfast was amazing as well as the location, which is situated 5 mins away from the train station. Enjoyed my stay there overall!

Nothing to complain really. The price is great compared to other hotels and with the metro next to you you are very connected to the City center. Rooms are modern, clean and functional but maybe a little small. A big advantage is the great breakfast which is literally free for you. Staff is very friendly and of course English speaking.

Perfect location if you have a car.  Free parking, even on the day of departure.  Large rooms, free mini golf,  great breakfast and a 5 minute walk to the train station that takes you into the city centre.  About 3 euro adult 1 way.  Highly recommended.

A big hotel, great location with metro stop just about 2 minutes walk away, convenient shops lie Netto, Coop,  as well as restaurants; a host of other hotels, Fisketorvet Shopping Mall, hostels etc. also nearby. Very clean rooms, large areas, conference center, spacious gym, separate saunas for males and females,  open rooftop to rest and catch the city areal view etc.

The very large reception area compliments the warm welcome of the great services of the personnels with special mention of and appreciation to Million.

This hotel is unique in many ways such as free parking and you even have electric charging points available.

Be aware this hotel has no refrigerators or tea/coffee/microwave in the rooms which was a down side for me.
